Dear All, 

 

Greetings, 

 

Now that we have received the Trade license on 08.09.2025, appreciate if we could get the below documents as listed to achieve our Targeted opening date.

*       Pending client documents:

o   Require ADCD approved AMC (FA/FF) from client latest by 20.09.2025.

o   Require Pest control AMC from the client latest by 20.09.2025.

o   Hassantuk installation certificate required from client latest by 25.09.2025.

o   Fitness certificate required from client latest by 25.09.2025

o   Public liability insurance from client required latest by 15.09.2025

o   Authority inspection process is estimated as 3-4 weeks from receiving all the above-mentioned client documents and fitout completion.

Kindly revert for any clarifications.

 

Thanks & Regards

prathap pandiyan	​​​​

Project updates.

 

Kindly be informed that we have Opening of " Penhaligon's Boutique - Yas Mall "The tentative of the unit handover on 25th Sep and opening date on 15 th OCT  2025 TBC.

 

To ensure a smooth opening, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time. A project checklist been submitted, and you received an email notification.

 

Please ensure to scroll down, click on Edit then update the status of each task.

Best regards,

Retail Operation UAE.

Subject: RE: RSO UAE - STORE OPENING - PROJECT UPDATES | (Penhaligon's Boutique - Yas Mall) - AMC, Hassantuk, Insurance

 

Dear All, 

 

Greetings, 

 

Now that we have received the Trade license on 08.09.2025, appreciate if we could get the below documents as listed to achieve our Targeted opening date.

*        Pending client documents:

o   Require ADCD approved AMC (FA/FF) from client latest by 20.09.2025.

o   Require Pest control AMC from the client latest by 20.09.2025.

o   Hassantuk installation certificate required from client latest by 25.09.2025.

o   Fitness certificate required from client latest by 25.09.2025

o   Public liability insurance from client required latest by 15.09.2025

o   Authority inspection process is estimated as 3-4 weeks from receiving all the above-mentioned client documents and fitout completion.

Kindly revert for any clarifications.

 

Thanks & Regards

prathap pandiyan

Subject: RSO UAE - STORE OPENING | (Penhaligon's Boutique - Yas Mall)

 

Dear All,

Hope you are doing well,

 

Please be informed that we are opening Penhaligon’s Boutique that is going to trade in Yas Mall on tentatively 1st September 2025 TBC.

 

We have prepared the Store Opening checklist for this store to ensure completion of all tasks. Each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on-time.

 

A Microsoft meeting invitation will be sent shortly to discuss the opening preparations and the assigned tasks, please ensure you attend.

 

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach the designated Local Ops, Mohamed Bata; 050 815 8454, Khaled Mostafa 050 970 6657 any time.

 

All the best, 

Retail Operations UAE
